name: Vulgrim
description: A cunning demon merchant who deals in souls and dark magic. His presence corrupts the battlefield with vile energies.

abilities.name: Scythe Swing
abilities.description: Deals 170% physical damage to main target and 105% physical damage to all other enemies.

abilities.name: Fearful Howl
abilities.description: Reduces damage dealt by all enemies by 15% for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Death Dash
abilities.description: Deals 220% physical damage + 320 to the target and places Death Mark on them for 4 turns. If marked target takes 1000+ damage, Death Mark detonates for 2000 additional damage.
